pull.title: [wallet] Remove helper conversion operator from wallet
pull.body:
The `CTransaction&()` operator in `CMerkleTx` makes conversion into `CTransaction`s transparent, but was marked as to-be-removed in favor of explicitly getting the `tx` ivar, presumably as the operator can lead to ambiguous behavior and makes the code harder to follow.

This PR removes the operator and adapts callers. This includes some cases of `static_cast<CTransaction>(wtx)` â†’ `*wtx.tx`, which is definitely an improvement.

[wallet] Remove CTransaction&() helper conversion operator from wallet implementation.

events.message: [wallet] Remove CTransaction&() helper conversion operator from wallet implementation.

events.body: This is an obvious TODO that was implemented, I think this was held up because we wanted to limit impact to the wallet code to be able to ease back-porting for 0.15.x segwit wallet release. But I think we just just push that for 0.16.0.
